events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's case has been classified under Refund due to their request for money back.
Agent Samantha has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to start the refund process?
I've attached the photo of the incorrect item and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will approve your refund shortly and send you instructions on how to return the wrong item.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund.
We have processed your refund and you should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we have now closed this case. Thank you!
